keywords: Aaj ka din, Stuti Prashansa kare

verse.name: v1
lines: Stuti Prashansa kare, Kyo na kuch hota rahe
Usko hum bhate rahe, chahe jaha bhi rahe

verse.name: v2
lines: Aaj ka din yahovah ne banaya hai
Hum is mai aanandit ho, aanandit ho

verse.name: v3
lines: Prabhu ko mahima mile, chahe ho mera apmaan
Wo badhe mai ghatu, rahe usi ka dhyaan

verse.name: v4
lines: Aata hut ere paas mujh ko hai tujh se aas
Mujh ko Kabul ker le, paapo se shudh ker de
